question:
Write a letter to the manager of your insurance company. In your letter:
  Describe the item you lost.
 Explain how you lost it.
 Tell the insurance company what you would like them to do.
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I have lost my digital camera during my holiday vacation.
I would let know you my camera is black in colour and LG brand which is covered by brown lander beg.It happens in Amritsar.

In addition, a few days before, I have visited Amritsar with my family for a holiday vacation. we were staying home in the central city of Amritsar. we went to see the museum which was very rashing  after when we reached  home then I noticed my camcorder was not missing so I think that I lost it at the market .

I brought that it  six months ago, according to me it is still under the insurance. I have a report from the police station already but I need your help to tell them some important information about  it so they can find it as possible as soon.
I look forward to hearing from you .
